[{"date":"2023-01-16T17:19:46Z","message":"Link rules to WAI site rather than CG site (#1987)

* Ensure rule links point to WAI site

* One unsaved change","sha":"51d00c112a84c060e3d18f73baf8ebc3a79db6fc","htmlUrl":"https://github.com/act-rules/act-rules.github.io/commit/51d00c112a84c060e3d18f73baf8ebc3a79db6fc"},{"date":"2022-11-14T13:50:49Z","message":"Adds consistency to accessibility support and assumptions wording (#1945)

* Adds consistency to accessibility support and assumptions wording

* "No assumptions." -> "There are no assumptions."

* "No accesibility support issues known." -> "There are no accessibility support issues known."

* Excludes deprecated

* Excludes deprecated

* Tries excluding deprecated

* Update _rules/links-with-identical-names-and-context-serve-equivalent-purpose-fd3a94.md

Co-authored-by: Jean-Yves Moyen <jym@siteimprove.com>

* Fixes

* Clean-up and fixes

* Fixes typo in heading

* Tries reverting __deprecated__

context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"off6ek","name":"HTML element language subtag matches language","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that the primary language subtag of an element matches its default language\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:3.1.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:H58":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"satisfied"}},"input_aspects":["DOM tree","Accessibility tree","CSS Styling","Language"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Jean-Yves Moyen"],"funding":["WAI-Tools"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["alt-require"]}

pageContext.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"off6ek","name":"HTML element language subtag matches language","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that the primary language subtag of an element matches its default language\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:3.1.2":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"further testing needed"},"wcag-technique:H58":{"forConformance":false,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"satisfied"}},"input_aspects":["DOM tree","Accessibility tree","CSS Styling","Language"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Jean-Yves Moyen"],"funding":["WAI-Tools"]},"htmlHintIgnore":["alt-require"]}
